channel.title: CVE Feed for Plugmatter Pricing Table Lite -- Plugmatter Pricing Table Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Plugmatter Pricing Table Lite -- Plugmatter Pricing Table Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-34659|2024-08-04T00:19:47.990Z -- plugmatter%20pricing%20table%20lite -- plugmatter%20pricing%20table%20lite
item.description: The Plugmatter Pricing Table Lite WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the `email` parameter in the ~/license.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.32.
